title: VidyaMitra Frontend-Only Implementation with Voice-Based Mock Interview

requirements.summary: Generate only frontend code without backend implementation
acceptanceCriteria: No backend Motoko files are generated
Frontend can run independently with mock data

file_operations.description: Create mock data service providing dummy data for roadmaps, quizzes, interview questions, and resume analysis to enable frontend-only operation

requirements.summary: Write all components using JSX format with clear comments for beginners
acceptanceCriteria: All React components use .jsx file extension
Code includes clear comments explaining functionality
Variable and function names are descriptive
Component logic is simple and easy to follow

file_operations.description: Create navbar component in JSX format with descriptive variable names and inline comments explaining navigation logic
Create sidebar component in JSX format with clear comments explaining navigation links and active state management

requirements.summary: Implement voice-based mock interview with audio recording and playback
acceptanceCriteria: Mock interview page includes microphone recording functionality
User can record voice responses to interview questions
Audio playback is available for reviewing responses
Clear UI indicators for recording state (recording, paused, stopped)

file_operations.description: Create mock interview page with voice recording using MediaRecorder API, displaying interview questions one at a time, recording user audio responses, showing recording status indicators (recording/paused/stopped), and providing playback controls for reviewing recorded answers

Create reusable voice recorder component in JSX handling microphone permissions, audio recording with start/pause/stop controls, visual recording state indicators, and audio blob generation for playback
Create CSS file for mock interview page styling including recording button states, question display layout, and audio playback controls using the specified color palette

requirements.summary: Create email-based OTP authentication with protected routes
acceptanceCriteria: Login page with email and OTP input fields exists
Register page includes email-based OTP verification flow
Successful authentication redirects to dashboard
Protected routes prevent unauthorized access to authenticated pages

file_operations.description: Create login page in JSX with email input, OTP input, submit button, mock authentication logic using localStorage, and redirect to dashboard on success with clear comments explaining the flow
Create registration page in JSX with email input, OTP generation simulation, OTP verification input, mock email sending feedback, and registration completion logic with redirect to login
Create authentication context in JSX managing login state, authentication status, user session in localStorage, login/logout functions, and providing auth state to protected routes
Create protected route wrapper component checking authentication status from AuthContext and redirecting to login page if user is not authenticated, with clear comments explaining the guard logic
Create CSS file for login and register pages using the specified color palette with form styling, button states, and responsive layout

requirements.summary: Create dashboard layout with navbar, sidebar, and main content area using plain CSS
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard layout includes navbar component
Sidebar contains navigation links: Dashboard, Resume, Roadmap, Quiz, Progress
Layout styling uses plain CSS files only
Layout is responsive and clean

file_operations.description: Create dashboard layout component in JSX composing Navbar, Sidebar, and main content area with responsive grid structure and clear comments explaining layout composition
Add navigation links for Dashboard, Resume, Roadmap, Quiz, Progress, and Mock Interview pages with active link highlighting and clear descriptive link text
Create dashboard home page in JSX displaying welcome message, quick stats summary, and recent activity overview with clear comments
Create CSS file for dashboard layout including navbar, sidebar, and main content grid using the specified color palette with responsive breakpoints and plain CSS only
Create CSS file for sidebar styling including navigation link styles, active state, hover effects using the specified color palette
Create CSS file for navbar styling including header layout, logo area, user profile section using the specified color palette

requirements.summary: Create resume upload page with file input, upload button, and analysis result placeholder
acceptanceCriteria: Resume page includes file input for uploading resumes
Upload button triggers file upload action
Success message displays after successful upload
Placeholder section exists for resume analysis results

file_operations.description: Create resume page in JSX with file input for PDF/DOC uploads, upload button triggering mock upload to localStorage, success message display, and placeholder section showing mock resume analysis results with clear comments
Create CSS file for resume page styling including file input area, upload button, success message, and analysis result placeholder using the specified color palette

requirements.summary: Create job role roadmap page with topic generation and progress tracking in localStorage
acceptanceCriteria: Roadmap page includes input field for job role and generate button
Generated roadmap displays topics and subtopics in list format
Each topic shows status: 'not started', 'in progress', or 'completed'
Progress persists using localStorage

file_operations.description: Create roadmap page in JSX with job role input, generate button triggering mock roadmap creation, displaying topics and subtopics in expandable list, status dropdowns for each topic (not started/in progress/completed), and localStorage persistence with clear comments
Create roadmap service in JSX providing functions to generate mock roadmap data based on job role, save/load roadmap progress to/from localStorage, and update topic status
Create CSS file for roadmap page styling including input form, topic list layout, status badges, and expandable subtopic sections using the specified color palette

requirements.summary: Create topic quiz module with dummy questions, answer marking, and score display
acceptanceCriteria: Quiz page includes topic input field and start test button
Dummy questions list is generated and displayed
User can select answers for each question
Final score is calculated and displayed after completion

file_operations.description: Create quiz page in JSX with topic input, start test button generating dummy multiple-choice questions, answer selection interface, submit button, and score calculation display with clear comments explaining quiz flow
Create quiz service in JSX providing functions to generate mock quiz questions based on topic, validate answers, calculate scores, and save quiz history to localStorage
Create CSS file for quiz page styling including question cards, answer option buttons, score display, and start/submit buttons using the specified color palette

requirements.summary: Create progress page showing roadmap completion, quizzes taken, and last activity from localStorage
acceptanceCriteria: Progress page displays roadmap completion as percentage
Number of completed quizzes is shown
Last activity timestamp is displayed
All data is retrieved from localStorage

file_operations.description: Create progress page in JSX fetching roadmap completion percentage, quiz count, and last activity timestamp from localStorage, displaying statistics in card format with clear comments
Create progress service in JSX providing functions to calculate roadmap completion percentage, count completed quizzes, retrieve last activity date, and aggregate data from localStorage
Create CSS file for progress page styling including stat cards, percentage display, progress bars, and summary sections using the specified color palette

requirements.summary: Apply specified color palette consistently throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: CSS uses #1e3a8a for primary color
CSS uses #38bdf8 for secondary color
CSS uses #22c55e for accent color
CSS uses #f8fafc for background color
CSS uses #0f172a for text color
Color usage is consistent across all pages and components

file_operations.description: Create CSS variables file defining the specified color palette as CSS custom properties: --primary-color: #1e3a8a, --secondary-color: #38bdf8, --accent-color: #22c55e, --background-color: #f8fafc, --text-color: #0f172a for consistent usage across all stylesheets
Import variables.css and apply global color scheme using the specified palette to body, headings, and base elements

requirements.summary: Organize frontend with clean folder structure and reusable components
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend has organized folders: components, pages, services, routes, context, styles
Navbar component is reusable across pages
Sidebar component is reusable across pages
API service file exists for centralized API calls
Structure follows beginner-friendly conventions

file_operations.description: Create API service file in JSX providing centralized mock API functions for future backend integration with clear comments explaining each endpoint placeholder

Update App component to set up React Router with route definitions for all pages (Login, Register, Dashboard, Resume, Roadmap, Quiz, Progress, MockInterview), wrap authenticated routes with ProtectedRoute component, and wrap the app with AuthContext provider
